Title: Staff maintain member
Description: staff maintain the member

Title: Staff maintain Route
Description: Staff able to maintain the Route

Title: Staff maintain bus
Description: Staff able to  maintain the bus

Title: Staff maintain bus schedule
Description: Staff able to maintain the bus schedule

Title: Manager maintain staff
Description: As a manager able to add new staff, search or view staff details, edit existing staff details, and change the staff status to resign.

Title: Manager generate report
Description: Manager able to generate different types of report that they want for making decision purpose

Title: Customer make payment
Description: Customer able to make payment to purchase the ticket

Title: Customer purchase bus ticket
Description: Customer are allow to purchase bus ticket by using the system

Title: Login
Description: Allow user to  login to the system

Title: staff delete a member
Description: As a staff, I want to delete a member from the list of member when it necessary so that the list of member is always up to date.

Title: staff  view and search for existing member
Description: As a staff, I want to view and search for existing member by entering their id before updating or deleting so it is easier to locate their information accordingly

Title: system to verify customer’s detail
Description: As a customer, I want the system to verify customer’s detail before updating it so it fulfill the format required.

Title: customer edit member detail
Description: As a customer, I want to edit my member detail so it is always up to date.

Title: customer register as new member
Description: As a customer, I want to register as new member so I can start to purchase ticket and make payment.

Title: staff delete a route
Description: As a staff, I want to delete a route from the list of route when there is necessary to change so that the list of route is always up to date.

Title: staff edit existing route detail
Description: As a staff, I want to edit existing route detail when there is necessary to change so that the route detail is always up to date.

Title: staff view existing route
Description: As a staff, I want to search or view existing route before updating or deleting it so it is easier to locate them from the list of route.

Title: staff add new route
Description: As a staff, I want to add new route to the list of route when it is necessary so the list of route is always up to date with latest information.

Title: staff delete a bus
Description: As a staff, I want to delete a bus from the list of bus when there is necessary to change so that the list of bus is always up to date.

Title: staff edit existing bus detail
Description: As a staff, I want to edit existing bus detail when there is necessary to change so that the bus detail is always up to date.

Title: staff search or view existing bus detail
Description: As a staff, I want to search or view existing bus detail before updating or deleting it so it is easier to locate them from the list of bus.

Title: staff add new bus
Description: As a staff, I want to add new bus to the list of bus when it is necessary so the list of bus is always up to date with latest information.

Title: staff delete bus schedule
Description: As a staff, I want to delete bus schedule from the list of bus schedule when there is necessary to change so the bus schedule is always up to date.

Title: staff edit existing bus schedule detail
Description: As a staff, I want to edit existing bus schedule detail whenever there is necessary to change so that the detail of the bus schedule is always up to date.

Title: Change staff status to resign
Description: As a manager, I want to change staff status to resign from the list of staff when it is necessary so that the list of staff is always up to date.

Title: staff search or view existing bus schedule
Description: As a staff, I want to search or view existing bus schedule before updating or deleting it so it is easier to locate them from the list of bus schedule.

Title: staff add new bus schedule
Description: As a staff, I want to add new bus schedule to the current bus schedule list when it is necessary so the bus schedule list is always up to date with latest information.

Title: Edit staff details
Description: As a manager, I want to edit existing staff detail

Title: Search and view staff details
Description: As a manager, I want to search or view existing staff detail by entering their id before updating or deleting so it is easier to locate them from the list of staff.

Title: Add new staff information
Description: As a manager, I want to add new staff into the list of staff when it is necessary so it is always up to date with latest information.

Title: Print out the report
Description: As a manager, I want the report generate in pdf form so it is easier to print out in hard copy form and show to the upper management.

Title: View yearly, monthly or weekly report
Description: As a manager, I want to select range of date of the report so I can choose certain duration instead of yearly / whole report.

Title: Select type of report
Description: As a manager, I want to select type of report so I can view the report according to requirement.

Title: customer select the type of payment method
Description: As a staff, I want customer to select the type of payment method as different customer have different payment method to be use.

Title: customer enter their payment detail
Description: As a staff, I want customer to enter their payment detail so the system continue process their reservation request.

Title: system to verify customer’s payment detail
Description: As a staff, I want system to verify customer’s payment detail to check for information validity before proceeding to confirmation so it can be accurate

Title: system to calculate cost and refund
Description: As a staff, I want system to calculate cost and refund so that the system can return exact amount to the customer.

Title: online receipt and ticket to be generated
Description: As a customer, I want my online receipt and ticket to be generated online so I can use for future references such as entering the bus

Title: customer  select date and time for bus schedule
Description: As a customer, I want to able to select date and time for bus schedule so I can check on the relevant route.

Title: customer view bus schedule and available seat
Description: As a customer, I want to view bus schedule and available seat so I can check on the bus schedule and bus seat availability.

Title: customer able to select schedule and seats
Description: As a customer, I want to able to select schedule and seats of the bus after checking on the schedule so I can make my reservation accordingly

Title: customer registration
Description: As a product owner, I want customer to choose registration before login as not every customer have their own account

Title: manager login
Description: As a product owner, I want manager login by entering their own id and password before proceed to do any action as different employee have different authority.

Title: staff to login
Description: As a product owner, I want staff to login by entering their own id and password before proceed to do any action so we can keep track of their action.

Title: customer to login
Description: As a product owner, I want customer to login by entering their own id and password before proceed to purchase ticket and make payment so it is easier to differentiate each customer detail.
